public static void InvokeVoid (this Microsoft.JSInterop.IJSInProcessRuntime jsRuntime, string identifier, params object[]? args);

Docs.param: An identifier for the function to invoke. For example, the value "someScope.someFunction" will invoke the function window.someScope.someFunction.
Docs.summary: Invokes the specified JavaScript function synchronously.
